T02D3275:26a-1: au pa de sha bi she sha:/
T02D3275:26a-4: rgyal ba rnam snang zhes grags dang //
T02D3275:26a-5: rin chen 'byung ldan nyid dang yang //
T02D3275:26a-6: snang mdzad dang ni don yod grub //
T02D3275:26a-7: mi bskyod par yang rab tu bsgrags //
T02D3275:26a-8: 'di dag mdog ni dkar dang ser //
T02D3275:26a-9: dmar dang ljang gu mthing nag yin //
T02D3275:26a-10: byang mchog mchog sbyin mnyam bzhag dang //
T02D3275:26a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon bh'um aam dzr'am kham h'um ngo //
T02D3275:26a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gdams ngag gi khyad par
